title: Panther - Private Layer 2 Protocol
description: To create an interchain DEX that bridges Cardano to DeFi with interoperability, institutional support, and KYC / AML compliant privacy.
solution: Integrate a privacy protocol that provides an interchain DEX & bridges Cardano to the DeFi; enabling access to retail & institutional users.
experience: Designed/reviewed 6 L1 protocols & 12 dApps, 29+ years b/w co-founders, team worked on 40+ protocols, banking, BlackRock & ConsenSys alumni.
